# R2 Medium PR Template

- RUN_ID:
- Agent:
- Objective:
- What changed:
- Why:

## Risk
- [x] R2 Medium (`risk:R2-medium`)
- Rationale:

## Gates (required)
- CI validate: REQUIRED
- Codecov patch: REQUIRED
- Bugbot: REQUIRED (run on stable diff)
- Claude: REQUIRED (run on stable diff)
- E2E: conditional

## Evidence
- CI run link:
- Codecov patch status:
- Bugbot comment link:
- Claude review link + verdict:
